title: Bloomberg Markets: Lail on Six Generations of Winemakers
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Lail on Six Generations of Winemakers
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Robin Lail Founder/Owner Lail Vineyards Discussing her family's history of producing some of the most elusive, coveted wines in Napa Valley.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
